hooks.name: gravityview_clear_form_cache
hooks.description: Flush the GravityView cache for this form

hooks.name: post_edd_sl_plugin_updater_setup

parameters.name: edd_plugin_data
parameters.description: Array of EDD SL plugin data.

hooks.name: edd_sl_plugin_updater_api_params
hooks.description: Filters the parameters sent in the API request.

parameters.name: api_params
parameters.description: The array of data sent in the request.

parameters.name: this->api_data
parameters.description: The array of data set up in the class constructor.

parameters.name: this->plugin_file
parameters.description: The full path and filename of the file.

hooks.name: gravityview_featured_entries_always_show
hooks.description: Allow override of default behavior, which is to respect search queries.

parameters.name: always_show_featured_entry
parameters.description: If returned true, featured entries will be shown even if the search doesn't match the entry

hooks.name: gravityview_featured_entries_enable
hooks.description: Enable or disable featured entries for this entry
